hero.subtitle: Stegocare takes on the complexity, so your team can focus on what only humans can do. Planning done. Billing handled. Compliance covered.

integrationLogos.heading: Seamlessly connected to the platforms you rely on

scrollRevealText.block1: Your team didn't choose care work to spend half their day on admin.
scrollRevealText.block2: But between planning in Excel, billing by hand, and chasing paper signatures — that's exactly what's happening.
scrollRevealText.block3: Every hour lost to admin is an hour taken from the people who need you most.
